parameters.name: CheckTypes
parameters.description: The types of policies to be queried (default queries both custom and system predefined policies).

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: Specifies the page number from which to start displaying the query results. The starting value is **1**. The default value is **1**, indicating that the display starts from the **1st** page.

parameters.name: DependentPolicyId
parameters.description:
ID of the associated parent policy.

(The specific dependency relationship from low to high is: Section -> Requirement -> Standard)

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Language type for request and response messages, with a default value of **zh**. Possible values:
- **zh**: Chinese
- **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of check item information entries displayed per page during pagination. The default value is **50**, indicating 50 entries per page.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description: ID of the newly added classification setting.

parameters.name: PolicyShowName
parameters.description: Name of the newly added classification setting.

parameters.name: PolicyType
parameters.description:
Policy type of the custom check item rule:
- **STANDARD**: New standard
- **REQUIREMENT**: New requirement
- **SECTION**: New section

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
Name of the associated major policy category (required when PolicyType is STANDARD):
- **AISPM**: AI Configuration Management (AI-SPM)
- **IDENTITY_PERMISSION**: Identity and Permission Management (CIEM)
- **RISK**: Security Risk
- **COMPLIANCE**: Compliance Risk
